title: Criticism of the Bible - Collection 31
description:
Criticism of the Bible - Collection 31:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Asimov - In the Beginning ...; Science Faces God in the Book of Genesis (1981)

-  Barnstone & Meyer - The Gnostic Bible, Rev. Ed. (2011)

-  Barnstone & Meyer (Eds.) - Essential Gnostic Scriptures; Texts of Luminous from the Ancient and Medieval Worlds .. (2010)

-  Bremmer (Ed.) - The Apocryphal Acts of Thomas (2001)

-  Collins - The Dead Sea  Scrolls; a Biography (2013)

-  Davies - Biblical Criticism; a Guide for the Perplexed (2013)

-  Enns - The Bible Tells Me So... Why Defending Scripture Has Made Us Unable to Read It (2014)

-  Evans - Ancient Texts for New Testament Studies; a Guide to the Background Literature (2005)

-  Feldman & Goldman - Scripture and Interpretation; Qumran Texts That Rework the Bible (2014)

-  Fitzmayer - The Interpretation of Scripture; In Defense of Historical-Critical Method (2008)

-  Gilmore - A Dictionary of the English Bible and its Origins (2000)

-  Hoffman - The Bible's Cutting Room Floor; the Holy Scriptures Missing from Your Bible (2014)

-  Humphrey - From Q to 'Secret' Mark (2006)

-  Jacobsen (Ed.) - The Discursive Fight over Religious Texts in Antiquity (2009)

-  Joseph - Jesus, Q, and the Dead Sea Scrolls; a Judaic Approach to Q (2012)

-  Krosney - The Lost Gospel; the Quest for the Gospel of Judas Iscariot (2006)

-  Law - The Historical-Critical Method; a Guide for the Perplexed (2012)

-  Lemche - Biblical Studies and the Failure of History; Changing Perspectives 3 (2013)

-  Lennox - Seven Days That Divided the World; the Beginning According to Genesis and Science (2011)

-  Leonard - Codex Schoyen 2650; a Middle Egyptian Coptic Witness to the Early Greek Text of Matthew's Gospel (2014)

-  Li - Greek Indicative Verbs in the Christian Palestinian Aramaic Gospels; Translation Technique and the Aramaic Verbal System (2013)

-  Resseguie - Narrative Criticism of the New Testament; an Introduction (2005)

-  Shanks - Freeing the Dead Sea Scrolls, and Other Adventures of any Archaeology Outsider (2010)

-  Sheppard - The Craft of History and the Study of the New Testament (2012)

-  Shinan & Zakovitch - From Gods to God; How the Bible Debunked, Suppressed, or Changed Ancient Myths & Legends (2012)

-  Steinberg - The Lost Book of Mormon; a Journey Through the Mythic Lands of Nephi, Zarahemla & Kansan City, Missouri (2014)

-  Taylor - The Essenes, the Scrolls, and the Dead Sea (2012)

-  The Bible, So Misunderstood, It's a Sin, Newsweek, January, 2-9, 2015

-  Thompson - The Bible and the Age of the Earth; Scripture and Science Series, 2e (2003)

-  Thuesen - In Discordance with the Scriptures; American Protestant Battles Over Translating the Bible (1999)

-  Tongue - Between Biblical Criticism and Poetic Rewriting; Interpretative Struggles Over Genesis 32 22-32 (2014)

-  Walck - The Son of Man in the Parables of Enoch and in Matthew (2011)

-  Wells - Who Was Jesus; a Critique of the New Testament Record (1989)

-  Wills - What the Gospels Meant (2008)

-  Zsengeller (Ed.) - Rewritten Bible after Fifty Years; Texts, Terms, or Techniques (2014)
